name: Ave Maria - Holy Grail - Churchill
additionalNotes: Crafted by the talented hands of master-blender A.J. Fernandez, and grown in the ultra-fertile volcanic soils of Nicaragua, Ave Maria cigars boast a pedigree few other brands can deliver. Time and time again, this brand has delivered boutique handmades to the market. With a first rate blend for any strength preference, each Ave Maria creation features spot-on construction, rich flavor, and a loyal fan base who will settle for nothing less.
